ðŸ“– Summary: Pseudoc is a pseudocode compiler that leverages AI to translate pseudocode into Go, which is then compiled into native executables. It uniquely combines AI and compiler technologies, resulting in features like non-reproducible builds and mandatory internet access. The project also claims to be a universal compiler, capable of significantly speeding up code written in other languages like Python.
